Overloaded:Chargeup.NAME: Gear up
Overloaded:Chargeup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When Overdrawn, increase this card's damage by !M! for the rest of combat.

Overloaded:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Overloaded:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Overloaded:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Overloaded:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Overloaded:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Overloaded:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Overloaded:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Overloaded:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Overloaded:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Overloaded:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Overloaded:OverloadSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Overloaded:OverloadSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Overloaded:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
